column5: An inviting 1920's cottage home in a popular up and coming neighborhood. Tobin Hill is a transitional neighborhood w/ diverse culture. It is a beautiful mix of old & remodeled homes, young professionals & 2nd/3rd generation original homeowners, & it is a quaint neighborhood w/ a splash of liveliness from local bars, eateries, and coffee shops a block away. 2 miles to downtown, & 1 mile to the Pearl, riverwalk (museum reach), zoo, gulf course, Children's Museum & Brackenridge Park.
